column4: anyone know why i cant boot my xp partition. gives me an error 13 invalid or unsupported executable format. checked online to no avail
i dont have the XP CD. didnt come with HP.
:| nothing like a bad ass restore cd which wipes the pc clean ;)
those kinds of problems always made me use a boot disk for linux, while that was an option. ;) these days, i prefer to run linux in vmware to avoid these hassles.
